channel.title: PowerShell on Malenko

item.title: Conduct a Fresh Environment Setup
item.description: Conduct a Fresh Environment Setup Intro Long ranting following. Please feel free to skip at your own choice. Why? Why not just install everything and be done with it. Just do whatever you need and want, set up your environment on a whim without any consequences. Well, that is a good question, and an answer would be that I decided to learn a new technology that would help me in my everyday work life.
